First long runs at polish peninsula Hel

Dec 18, 2014

[ hel  run  long-run  running-with-dog  ]

December 2014 I spent my winter holidays on beautiful polish penisula Hel with my dog. We done together nice three long runs.

Two races in region to consider:

  • Maraton Północy (Bieg czterech latarni) link

  • Go To Hel (ultra run 80k and 120k) link

first: 19 kilometers

#raw #chillout #noHumans just #sea and #beach lovly #polish #seaside #hel #baltic

A post shared by Rubi (@rubi_labrador) on Dec 16, 2014 at 5:47am PST

second: 21 kilometers

#beach #chalupy #run #jogging #halfMarathon #dog #labrador #seaside #baltic

A post shared by Rubi (@rubi_labrador) on Dec 16, 2014 at 5:43am PST

#jogging with #labrador #dog on the #beach #chalupy #hel #poland #seaside @andi_triathlon

A post shared by Rubi (@rubi_labrador) on Dec 17, 2014 at 12:44pm PST

third: 37 kilometers

My dog “Rubi” after 37k

I am so extremly tired after #18km #run #dog #labrador #sleep #jogging

A post shared by Rubi (@rubi_labrador) on Dec 14, 2014 at 2:19pm PST

Some active regenration walks at Hel
